title: Interball Polar Cap Activity Index, Key Parameters - V.Sergeev  (Institute of physics Univ. of St.-Peterburg St.-Peterburg, Russia )

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/interball/ground/geo_index/1995/ig_k0_pci_19950807_v01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 100.0000% of the 287 timesteps. Cadence = 300000 [ms] = PT5M.
info.contact: V.Sergeev @ Institute of physics Univ. of St.-Peterburg St.-Peterburg, Russia
